list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the soft substance consisting of muscle and fat that is found between the skin and bones of an animal or a human.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she grabbed Anna's arm, her fingers sinking into the flesh
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô nắm lấy cánh tay của Anna, những ngón tay của cô chìm xuống xác thịt

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he had fleshed out to a solid 220 pounds
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta đã xác thịt ra một 220 pound rắn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: give (a hound or hawk) a piece of the flesh of game that has been killed in order to incite it.
remove the flesh adhering to (a skin or hide).
